title: Newly Renovated Apartment in Desirable Sauganash!
map_address: N. Cicero Ave near W. Peterson
posting_body: Deluxe fully updated 1BR/1BTH apartment featuring fully remodeled cabinet kitchen with granite counter tops, new appliances, including microwave & dishwasher, ceiling fans & mini blinds, gleaming hardwood floors, tiled bath, and loads of natural light.
Excellent location near shopping, restaurants, transportation and Eden’s express way entrance ramp.
Call Chad Johnson, Ettinger Realty, Ltd 847-982-3202 for more information.
